mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller_info(seller_name, seller_tel, seller_id, seller_pass, seller_birth, seller_gender, seller_addr_num, seller_addr_jibun, seller_addr_road, seller_addr_detail, seller_business_name, seller_business_num) VALUES (#{sellerInfoNum}, #{sellerName}, #{sellerTel}, #{sellerId}, #{sellerPass},#{sellerBirth}, #{sellerGender}, #{sellerAddrNum}, #{sellerAddrJibun}, #{sellerAddrRoad}, #{sellerAddrDetail}, #{sellerBusinessName}, #{sellerBusinessNum})
